​Get a Programming Job You'll Love with Great Pay​Even If You're Not a Senior Developer.

Video Course: 16 Hours (8 Live Sessions)

Live Chat and Office Hours

» BUY THIS NOW AND GET STARTEDarrow-down

Get the Job You Want from The Company You Want...

1.

GET NOTICED BY YOUR NEW BOSS

This course walks you through how to get noticed by managers and employees of the companies you want to work for and then how to capitalize on their attention to get hired.

2.

USE INSIDE INFORMATION TO BE RELEVANT 

This course walks you through how to learn what the employer needs and how to demonstrate that you're the person with those skills or the desire to learn.

3.

IDENTIFY YOUR DREAM JOB AND FIND IT

This course walks you through identifying companies that you'd like to work for, finding out how they hire people like you, and then getting you in the door.

4.

GET THE JOB BEFORE IT HITS THE JOB BOARDS

Most of the great jobs are getting filled before they ever see the job board. Let us help you short circuit the process and get the jobs when they become available instead of when the boss is finally looking at people on the internet.

arrow-down

Get Hired in the Programming Job You Want 

8 Live Video Modules that show you how to find your dream job.

The Productive Job Search      

Nov 6: 4pm-6pm MDT

We dive into the steps you'll take and how they match up with the steps hiring managers take to find and hire the people they need.

Resumes and Identifying Your Dream Job

Nov 13: 4pm-6pm MDT

This section dives into how to structure your resume and cover letter as well as how to find and identify companies you want to work for.

Researching Companies and Getting Contacts

Nov 20: 4pm-6pm MST

This section of the course dives into finding information about companies, meeting employees, and framing this information in how you communicate with hiring managers.

Getting Noticed by Employers From the Outside

Dec 4: 4pm-6pm MST

This section of the course focuses on standing out online and at events where people from the company you want to work for will be.

Getting Noticed by Employers From the Inside

Dec 11: 4pm-6pm MST

This section of the course helps you identify ways to become an insider on how the company works and where they place their value. We show you how to use your insider status to get hired.

Mastering Programming Interviews

Dec 18: 4pm-6pm MST

Once you've gotten noticed and get a job interview, you'll need to know what to expect. This section walks you through common programming interview techniques and how to prepare for them.

Offer Letters and Salary Negotiations

Jan 8: 4pm-6pm MST

Congratulations! You got a job offer! Now what? You're not done. This section walks you through making the most of a job offer and how to get what you want from this new opportunity.

How to Become a Better Programmer

Jan 15: 4pm-6pm MS​T

Whether you're working for a company already or trying to beef up your relevant experience to get hired, this section of the course will walk you through the process of knowing what to learn and how to learn it quickly.

About Your Instructor

Hi! I'm Chuck. (Charles Max Wood on the internet.) I've helped, coached and hired hundreds of developers.

A job is one of those things that effects ever aspect of life. The amount of money you make, whether you're invigorated or drained when you come home, and whether you feel challenged at work all change the way you live. 

None of us just live to work either! We work to support our lives and families in a particular lifestyle. 

I'd love to get to know you and help you on your journey to getting a job you'll love as part of a life you'll love.

Here's What You'll Get

 Join us for 8 live sessions where we discuss building your resume, getting noticed by employers, and finding great companies!

Get worksheets, checklists, and document templates (resume, cover letter, etc.) for each step of finding a job.

Also get download or stream videos.

We have a live chat where you can get clarifications, ask questions, and get help specific to your situation.

Is This Course Right For You?

This course is not for everyone! We're specifically focused on people who aren't senior developers and don't have a network.

Who is this for

  • check-circle-oDevelopers struggling to get interviews.
  • check-circle-oProgrammers sending their resumes out across all the job boards with few results.
  • check-circle-oPeople who are lining up interviews, but can't seem to get a job offer.
  • check-circle-oDevelopers who feel stuck or stagnated in their current job.

Who is this not for

  • times-circle-oPeople with a large network people they can tap.
  • times-circle-oSenior developers with a strong reputation or resume.
100% Money Back Guarantee for 6 Months

Put us to the test! Use our product for up to 6 months, risk-free. If for any reason you are not completely satisfied, return the product for a full refund.Just drop us a note at chuck@devchat.tv to take advantage of our 6-Month Money-Back Guarantee.

Bonus Section

Here's all the help you'll get in addition to the videos and chat room.

» SWEET! I'm so excited to get started!

Private Community

In addition to the chat room, you'll be added to a private Facebook Group where you can ask questions and interact with each other. This and the chat room will be where we check in on your progress and make sure you're on the right track.

+

Office Hours

Every week at a set time, I'll hop on the chat and live video to help you out with any questions you have. This can include, but isn't limited to, resume help, introductions to people I know at companies you're applying to, practicing interview questions, and anything else that comes up.

Start Today! Choose Your Plan Below

FAQ

What do I get?

You'll get access to all 8 LIVE sessions and the video recordings afterward.You'll also get access to the live chat, the Facebook group, and the office hours during the course to help you along the way to finding the job you deserve.

What software do you use for the live videos?

I use WebinarJam and post the videos to Vimeo. Both platforms work fine in Google Chrome and most other modern browsers with no plugins.

How long do I have access to the course?

The videos will be available to you to watch or download after the presentation. I encourage you to attend the sessions live so you can ask questions and get direct, relevant help. But I understand that's not always possible.

Didn't find the answer you're looking for?

Email chuck@devchat..tv

How can I get a refund?

Send an email to chuck@devchat.tv.

Why should I buy this course?

The traditional job search focuses on applying to as many companies as possible and then hoping to ace an interview. With just a little preparation and deliberate action, you can get a job with company you like doing what you love.

I'm a minority/woman. Will this work for me?

In short, yes. This course focuses on helping you match what you have to offer with what a company needs. If you can successfully do that, you'll get hired.Also, more and more companies are working to make sure they have fair hiring practices. This isn't a guarantee, but it helps.

I'm a Senior Developer and I'm struggling to find a job. Are you sure this isn't for me?

Generally, Senior Developers have worked with a lot of people across a lot of companies. So, they have a larger pool of people and experience to draw from. However, sometimes they still need help representing themselves properly.

This course will definitely help with that, but I encourage you to talk to people you already know first, to see if there's something you can do that's fast or easy that'll get you a job you'll love.

Get the Job You Deserve!

EN​​​​ROLL NOW
